libsyntactic Developer's Documentation

v1.0

                     This is the developer's documentation. It contains adequate information about the entire syntactic code structure. Hence developers are
free to modify the code based on this information. The developer's documentation is intended for those interested in modifying and improving the
libsyntactic's code. It is not meant for normal users who just want to create neural networks for some purpose or the other. Normal users can instead access the user's documentation
     
       NOTE: Even developers are advised to view the user's documentation before viewing this documentation, for a better understanding.
